metadata.title: CVE-2020-8032 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A Insecure Temporary File vulnerability in the packaging of cyrus-sasl ofopenSUSE Factory allows local attackers to escalate to root. This issueaffects: openSUSE Factory cyrus-sasl version 2.1.27-4.2 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: cyrus-sasl2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
